attributes.action: End the murder of the helpless babies. End abortion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Based on biblical principles. "For you created my inmost being, you knit me together in my mother's womb. I praise you because I am fearfully and wonderfully made, your works are wonderful...My frame was not hidden from you when I was made in the secret place...your eyes saw my unformed body. All the days ordained for me were written in your book before one of them came to be." (Psalm 139: 13-16) PLEASE END ABORTION!!!
